channel.title: ai on Fishy's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in ai on Fishy's Notebook

item.title: A Leap of Faith for Intelligence
item.description: A Visit to Chick-fil-a Quite a few months ago, I met up with an old friend at a Chick-fil-a. We somehow ended up on the topic of metacognition, or thinking about thinking. My perspective on the matter was that it is impossible for an intelligence to be completely aware of its own though process, but it was rather hard to communicate the idea. The best thing I could do was to explain how you can’t fit a full carton of fries inside of another full carton of fries.

item.title: Metacognition and Fries
item.description: A Visit to Chick-fil-a Quite a few months ago, I met up with an old friend at a Chick-fil-a. We somehow ended up on the topic of metacognition, or thinking about thinking. My perspective on the matter was that it is impossible for an intelligence to be completely aware of its own though process, but it was rather hard to communicate the idea. The best thing I could do was to explain how you can’t fit a full carton of fries inside of another full carton of fries.
